rows.SHOPIFY STOREFRONT — BRAND & PACKAGING S: Visual identity for AI mockup generation. Not final brand — enough to make it look real.

rows.col_2: "Premium electrolytes. Zero compromise." / "Hydrate smarter." / "The electrolyte for people who read labels."
Smart, clean, no-BS. Not bro-science. Not wellness woo. Think: Aesop meets Athletic Greens. Premium without pretension.
Deep navy (#0D2137) + white (#FFFFFF) + one accent (electric blue #4FC3F7 or ocean teal #00ACC1)
Citrus: warm gold (#FFB74D). Berry: deep purple (#7B1FA2). Unflavored: clean white/silver (#E0E0E0).
Headline: geometric sans-serif (Inter, Outfit, or similar). Body: clean sans-serif. NO script fonts. NO all-caps except logo.
Bright, clean, studio-lit. Not dark/moody. Not overly lifestyle. Product is the hero. Think: product on a clean surface with one contextual object (water bottle, gym towel, morning coffee).
Wordmark "IonWave" in custom geometric sans-serif. Optional: subtle wave element in the "W" or as an accent mark. Clean enough to work at 1cm on a stick pack.
Stick packs in a box. 30 count.
Front: IonWave logo + flavor name + one accent color stripe. Back: supplement facts + brief copy. Minimal. The stick pack is small — don't overcrowd.
Front: IonWave logo centered. Flavor name below. "30 servings" at bottom. One product photo or abstract element. Side: supplement facts panel. Back: brand story (2-3 sentences) + website + barcode.
Sodium: 1000mg, Potassium: 200mg, Magnesium: 60mg, Chloride: [TBD]. Zero sugar. Zero calories. Zero artificial flavors. [THESE ARE PLACEHOLDERS — real numbers come from M0 formulation thesis]

"Product packaging mockup of a premium electrolyte supplement. Stick pack box, 30 count, on a clean white surface. Deep navy box with clean white sans-serif logo 'IonWave'. One accent color stripe (electric blue). Minimal modern design. Supplement aesthetic between Aesop and Athletic Greens. Studio photography. Include one loose stick pack next to the box."
